Installation
The latest version can be found on the website's download page.
To compile you need the following programs installed on your system:
GCC
libtool
Proctal can optionally compile with the following libraries listed with the features they enable:
capstone - Disassembling instructions.
keystone - Assembling instructions.
Proctal provides the familiar configure, compile and install process:
$ ./configure
$ make
$ make install
Run ./configure -h to read about the options you have available that can change how Proctal will be compiled and installed.
